description: The name of a specific Spaceheat finite state machine. That name is used as a literal enum for a set of staets.

value_descriptions.IsoValve: Finite State Machine reflecting the state of the Iso Valve in a House 0 design
value_descriptions.RelayState: Finite State Machine for a normally open or normally closed relay whose states (Closed, Open) are enumerated by RelayClosedOrOpen.
value_descriptions.RelayPinState: Finite State Machine for a relay pin with states enumerated by RelayEnergizationState (Energized and DeEnergized).
